projects.place: Audubon's Silver Bluff Bird Sanctuary, South Carolina
projects.memory: Saw three juvenile spoonbills and lots of wood storks.
Saw my first painted bunting while out hiking with my kids.
Was visited by a Steller's Jay while feeding chipmunks after getting to the top of The Incline.
A western tanager flew right up to me while I was hiking to the top of Cheyenne Mountain.
Looked out my back window and spotted my first Loggerhead Shrike while he ate a giant grasshopper on my fence.
